title: my headstone when I die is going to say "ggwp"
body:
and it will be beautiful

or maybe it'll say - @life - gg

replies.body:
If League eventually becomes not popular or dies out in years to come, by the time you die you might want to change that xD

Same goes for tattoos, gotta be careful with trends.
"ggwp" is from far more than league.  as a phrase its existed for well over 20 years now.
You have a point, but he probably wanted it to be GGWP because of playing LoL.
.I doubt league's popularity will decrease.
You never know, 10 or more years down the line we might not even play computer games anymore.

we'll be playin games on VR. CoD acheives its final form as the perfect military propaganda device. Red vs. Blue gets remastered in stunning HD. People build remote gundams and fight each other with them. Fanservice.

the future is gonna be wierd.
.I doubt league's popularity will decrease.
Also...I doubt league's popularity will decrease.
Mine could say "Uh...Lag?"
death is just a big lag spike lmfao
Respawn timers are terrible
"shit, my parents are calling me. g2g!"
that was funny and morbid. love it :p
That depends what rank you were in before you died. Hopefully your tombstone won't read "GG EZ"

let it say:

gg ff@(insert age when dead)
mine will say "#YOLO"
yolo is so 2012

> [{quoted}](name=RoguePanda99,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=lWdb7O8w,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-04-29T01:04:38.422+0000)
>
> yolo is so 2012

Yeah but by the time I die it'll be retro and cool again.
It was never cool.

> [{quoted}](name=Stormfather,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=lWdb7O8w,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-29T01:11:31.816+0000)
>
> It was never cool.

Damn I didn't know we had the authority on cool frequenting these forums.  Sorry for being wrong on a subjective pop culture reference.

Ive got some friends who get that worked out for you.

but my suggestion?  "gg no re"

sure its a more sc themed epitaph, but its hillarious.

Mine is going to say "Respawning in..."

Reincarnation is a wonderful concept :)
If i ever come across a grave stone X amount of years from now and it reads "GG EZ", I'll find a witch and curse their undead spirit. Let's see how easily it will be to break a curse, IN HELL!
Ez
Report Kindred
Mine will say "Worth"

Mine will say "...brb" with a random date in the future written on it >:D


http://data1.whicdn.com/images/77173790/large.gif
have it say gg ez.

"Here lies Josh.
 -gg ez"

Mine shall say 
"GG Ez"
